replies.body: She doesn't need nerfs, she needs a rework. She was just simply poorly designed, impossible to properly balance, either she'd always be stupid strong or she'd just be worthless.  Bad design at its finest.
You know something is up when the newest released champion is in need of a rework more urgent than a guy from League beta {{champion:9}}

STOP SAYING FIDDLE NEEDS A REWORK! just because you don't want to play him doesn't mean other's don't want to. Not every champ needs to be a meta scum, gap closer, ranged hard CC(lul he has those), burst, some OP mechanic etc etc. I rather he stay this way and just make a new champ for you haters.

Edit: to elaborate for those you aren't familiar he's sitting at a positive stance in high elo. Even though he's not played much when he is he is outperforming many other mids.

Tbh, I think fiddle needs a rework because his solo lane presence is extremely oppressive in certain match ups and useless in others. It can be a small rework like the xin zhao one, but I think it needs to be done for both fiddle players and people who play against him.

> [{quoted}](name=SymbolicFear,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ejT2cBK3,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-01-30T12:49:41.358+0000)
>
> She doesn't need nerfs, she needs a rework. She was just simply poorly designed, impossible to properly balance, either she'd always be stupid strong or she'd just be worthless.  Bad design at its finest.

She needs harsh nerfs until she gets a rework.

> [{quoted}](name=Kinkou Order,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ejT2cBK3,comment-id=00010002,timestamp=2018-01-30T15:49:36.721+0000)
>
> She needs harsh nerfs until she gets a rework.

The Eve/Urgot treatment, for sure.

> [{quoted}](name=SymbolicFear,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ejT2cBK3,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-01-30T12:49:41.358+0000)
>
> She doesn't need nerfs, she needs a rework. She was just simply poorly designed, impossible to properly balance, either she'd always be stupid strong or she'd just be worthless.  Bad design at its finest.

swap some of her Q damage in her W passive (the three things that seems an ahri's W),her damage output is still good but she wont OS from 800+range

Or into her passive
Or both
Just spread it out
IDK who looked at that basic kit and thought tuning the numbers to be a burst mage was a good idea

Tinfoil hat theory time, but I'm pretty sure - knowing CertainlyT - that Zoe was designed to be a burst mage that bursts with one ability. She has a zero-damage ult, basically a zero-damage W, and her E is most notable for its damage amp. That's not a numbers thing, that's just a character who was flat-out designed to kill you with a single Q. 

It's completely terrible design, but that at least appears to be the intention. Spreading out damage to her passive and W 100% needs to happen.

no, even better, SHE NEEDS A DELETE!
{{sticker:sg-miss-fortune}}
She needs nerfs until reworked.
Look at this guy, can't even dodge a skill shot that didn't even look like it was going to hit him, would have suddenly appeared from fog of war and was at least 2 Teemos away when it did. Amateur.

This. I love how people say just dodge her Q, just dodge her E etc. Same was with cho gath - "just kite him" and then same sht happens in worlds, challenger soloq etc and suddenly people realize its not an argument. Some people. Because most of them still brainlessly defend broken champ.

> [{quoted}](name=Antergaton,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ejT2cBK3,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2018-01-30T13:54:33.718+0000)
>
> Look at this guy, can't even dodge a skill shot that didn't even look like it was going to hit him, would have suddenly appeared from fog of war and was at least 2 Teemos away when it did. Amateur.

Did someone say...dodge?


{{champion:53}}
CT: This is mechanical outplay {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

> [{quoted}](name=leakinb,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ejT2cBK3,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2018-01-30T13:04:10.728+0000)
>
> CT: This is mechanical outplay {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

Your face when you made yet another mess of a champ that's gonna end up a balance nightmare:  
https://imgur.com/5T0pLl2
This is the epitome of terrible design. One damage ability, either she is God-tier or worthless. They need to just gut her until they rework her.

A single damaging ability with huge output is not necessarily a bad design, but Zoe's Q is also spammable, and can be cast from fog of war.

That's basically old Nidalee.

> [{quoted}](name=IDidNotTouchHer,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ejT2cBK3,comment-id=00080000,timestamp=2018-01-30T18:37:21.128+0000)
>
> A single damaging ability with huge output is not necessarily a bad design, but Zoe's Q is also spammable, and can be cast from fog of war.
> 
> That's basically old Nidalee.

I would disagree, that is a hallmark of bad design. You can't balance it. It will never feel good to play against, when you inevitably get hit by it
Dude, check the Zoe build. Any burst mage or assassins could have done the same. Love when a Zed or Talon (or MF with {{item:3147}} and crit build) does the same, it's considered balanced.
If Zed was one hitting people with a single Q, I'd be super scared.

> [{quoted}](name=Hethalean,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ejT2cBK3,comment-id=00050000,timestamp=2018-01-30T14:29:08.113+0000)
>
> If Zed was one hitting people with a single Q, I'd be super scared.

Zed has the potential to 100-0 an enemy in lane with {{item:3134}} 

I remember that clip of MF with {{item:3142}} {{item:3147}}  1 shotting a Katarina with a single Q (with the old draktharr passive)




But I get it, full build burst mage, also fed shouldn't be allowed to kill people.

lol no i was just saying if one ability from zed was killing poeple.  not just 100-0.  For instance, his Q damage alone.  That'd make me scared.   In that image, Zoe didn't even have to hit bubble, so it was just Q damage (i forget if her Q applies her passive.  Don't think so but maybe).  That's what scary.  Getting blapped like that after getting sleeped is one thing. lol

> [{quoted}](name=Hethalean,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ejT2cBK3,comment-id=0005000000000000,timestamp=2018-01-30T14:42:29.315+0000)
>
> lol no i was just saying if one ability from zed was killing poeple.  not just 100-0.  For instance, his Q damage alone.  That'd make me scared.   In that image, Zoe didn't even have to hit bubble, so it was just Q damage (i forget if her Q applies her passive.  Don't think so but maybe).  That's what scary.  Getting blapped like that after getting sleeped is one thing. lol

{{item:3087}} {{item:3147}} {{item:3031}} Vayne tumble + aa who can one shot a squishy ? 

Once again check both team's scoreboards. Zoe is fed as fuck, Ezreal has 0 kills.

I think that you are under the impression that I'm arguing against you.  I was just trying to say something in agreement... then explain it. lol  Does any of your examples that you've given not make you a tid bit fearful?  Cuz you seem to believe me saying that it'd make me scared means something other than it makes me scared if i'm a squishy.

Zed has mobility. Zoe doesn't. Zed has more reliable 100-0 capabilities. Zoe needs E to hit for that kind of burst. Zoe has counters, if you dont use them, that's on you

Zed is also ad, giving him better split pushing ability.

All in all, different champs are different.

Not to be argumentative, but in that video, Zoe definitely did not hit E to burst Ezreal like she did. lol

Also I mean... claiming Zoe doesn't have mobility... isn't ... exactly true.  I've definitely seen her pick up 3 flashes in a row and just sort of Katarina around. or protobelts, and what not.  It's just not as reliable.  Also yes, different champions are different..  I'm not saying anything about balance.  Just what would make me afraid in a game.  Are you saying I shouldn't be afraid of a fed as fuck Zed because well 'Zoe is a different champion'?

That's kind of the point, isnt it? Any champion can melt you if they are fed enough. 

Put someone on a level playing field with zoe, and Q alone isnt going to 1 shot. 

I still struggle to see why people complain about burst mages doing their job. Do you prefer consistent and safe range damage? Then why all the adc hate? The simple answer is that most people on the boards just want to bitch about something or another instead of learning to play against it.

I mean it all depends.  Most burst mages need to be close to you and there's a series of spells to land.  Zoe just needed one.  1800 damage on one basic ability is pretty big.  Only other non ultimate I can think of like that is Veigar.  However, Zoe's max damage is from when she was 1700 from where she cast the ability.  (2500 max range, 800 the other way, then 1700 for max I think).  Most burst mages need to blap someone with most of their kit, not just one super fast projectile.  I mean I"m not complaining here.  I was just commenting on how anyone killing people from 100% with one ability is scary.  If she's that far away from you, especially with her ultimate, there's not a lot you can do to catch or retaliate I imagine.  I'm sure there is but

> [{quoted}](name=Kanzler,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ejT2cBK3,comment-id=0005000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2018-01-30T15:34:33.199+0000)
>
> Zed has mobility. Zoe doesn't. Zed has more reliable 100-0 capabilities. Zoe needs E to hit for that kind of burst. Zoe has counters, if you dont use them, that's on you
> 
> Zed is also ad, giving him better split pushing ability.
> 
> All in all, different champs are different.

Wtf are you talking about, zoe has a 70% MS buff that lasts 4 secs lategame and also grants her an item or summoner spell effect at the same time, and she has her ulty that can be used in a lot of ways. If she has no mobility then 80% of the roster also don't.
His Q isnt comparable.

When was I comparing it?  I was simply responding to a comment about someone saying Zed 100-0'ing someone with that'd make me scared if one ability would kill me.

Zed 1 Q + people dead from 100% = me scared

That guy wasn't saying Zed can/could/should one shot with a Q and you know it.

He meant that other characters who are meant to burst coupled with being fed can also do unfair one shots and nobody complains about that. 


A zed in this situation could have more reliably tore through that Ezreal as well, paying for it with some of his safety.

I wasn't saying that either, and you know it.  I was just saying that no matter what getting one shot with one dmg ability is scary.  It really sounds like you're just trying to scrounge for a fight, so I'll leave this here. lol I was just joking and that is all.  Sorry if you couldn't realize it.

Great, it happened in Korea now. Can you people PLEASE acknowledge that her design is toxic and broken now? Not every champion that doesn't have a burst ultimate needs to do fuck tons of damage to "compensate" the uptime is already enough.
_"No no she only hurts if she lands her bubble first"_ fools say...
That's what happens when you load easily over 60% of a champ's damage into a single ability.

Even if Zoe is OP, I have no interest in playing her. 

Looks like a champion for children.

Because they took a different art approach?

I feel like that's similar to saying "I won't play Gragas or Tahm Kench because they were designed for fat slobs" or "I won't play Yasuo or Kayn because I'm not a teenage edgelord" or even "I won't play Udyr because I'm not a furry"

> [{quoted}](name=Sp33d Zer0,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ejT2cBK3,comment-id=00120001,timestamp=2018-01-30T19:13:45.490+0000)
>
> Because they took a different art approach?
> 
> I feel like that's similar to saying "I won't play Gragas or Tahm Kench because they were designed for fat slobs" or "I won't play Yasuo or Kayn because I'm not a teenage edgelord" or even "I won't play Udyr because I'm not a furry"

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DDQ9tHMSA74

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=b7b_5xmgnWY
https://youtu.be/uWJ0oSWt9Jc?t=24s

> [{quoted}](name=Sp33d Zer0,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ejT2cBK3,comment-id=0012000100000000,timestamp=2018-01-30T19:22:00.568+0000)
>
> https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=b7b_5xmgnWY

Yeah, not well developed on that end, but Gragas is cool. A Scotsman that enjoys the pub and doesn't mind getting into a fight.

As for the other champions, I don't make those sorts of relations to them. As for Annie, well, yeah, she's somewhat childish too, but she's got that evil horror look going for her.

And it is completely fine to not make those sorts of relations. You are allowed to have your own opinion. My point is that saying a particular champion is for a specific type of character based off of solely their personality is a silly thing to do. Think about the variety we have in league; we have a succubus, a reaper, a self-righteous fighter of magic, soon a tyrannical overlord of a war torn nation.


We have a bird couple, we have strong women leading tribes in the frozen north in the harshest of land scapes. We have an insane girl with guns galore, we have cops, we have squirrel things. Is it really that out of place to have an obnoxious child?

Oh, well, thanks man. I'm very glad I'm allowed to have my own opinion, and that the relations that I am not making are acceptable to make.

Anyway, you're taking my statement too literally and making all sorts of interpretations that do not follow from what I was saying.

I said: "Looks like a champion for children"

I didn't say: "Only children or [insert character here] play this champion" or "this champion should not be released because she is [insert generalization here]".
Interactive gameplay right there.

Kat can do this in aoe lol.

Stop mindlessly bitching about zoe.
Kat is also melee, has less base health, less utility, less siege capability, less range on all of her abilities, and has no cc whatsoever.
He isn't bitching about Zoe. He just wanted to show you a neat Zoe clip{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
